meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The teensy kitten fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: I found a teensy bug crawling on the leaf.
meanings.sent3: The teensy mouse tried to carry a crumb bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her teensy voice was barely audible over the loud music.
meanings.sent5: The teensy star twinkled in the vast night sky.

meanings.definition: Slightly or just a little bit.
meanings.sent1: She was feeling teensy tired after the long walk.
meanings.sent2: He added just a teensy bit of sugar to his coffee.
meanings.sent3: The cake was teensy sweet, but still delicious.
meanings.sent4: The flower bent over teensy in the strong wind.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf wobbled teensy, but didn't fall over.
